GSD.product_version: versions from v5.17 to before v5.17.14
GSD.description:
ext4: fix memory leak in parse_apply_sb_mount_options()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.17.14 by commit 9ea3e6168948189cec31d0678d2b55b395f88491, it was introduced in version v5.17 by commit 7edfd85b1ffd36593011dec96ab395912a340418. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: ext4: fix memory leak in parse_apply_sb_mount_options()
